Articles.Content:
Hello my name is Karl And im here to present you my firs reliable and very stable spaceplane/glider that I spent ( 30 minutes into making ) love and time into making this fine piece of equipment.

Facts:

Stalls at - 20m/s ( It is very capable of gliding over 25m/s )

Lifts of at - 69m/s

Max speed at 90 degrees - 175m/s

My experience on forums is that everyone thinks that random people are hackers but im new to this forum and I dont know how to upload pictures so please help ME!?

Download: http://www./?3o7mf92gtp3qc8t

That is all, best regards Karl.

From the previous text;

Facts:

Stalls at - 20m/s ( It is very capable of gliding over 25m/s )

Lifts of at - 69m/s

Max speed at 90 degrees - 175m/s

Note that the max speed is under a thousand meters is the one that is stated in the facts list

and with further testing the max speed around medium thin air is about 500m/s with a 10 degree climb,

and the thin air near the edge of the atmosphere is impossible to get to even with this aircraft.

Anyway i made it to the south pole with a third of a fuel tank left.

Cheerio, Karl

here is my photo album: http://s1204.photobucket.com/albums/bb414/pikmin2faner/Kerbal%20space%20program/

Sorry if there is any ads. (I do not get money from the ads)
This is really a well designed plane. It's incredibly stable and maneuverable for it's size. Congratulations.
